comments.body: also exercise patch (and ensure it was effective), namespaced and cluster-wide list, and deletecollection (can create a second one with a specific label, then filter the list/deletecollection calls to that label to scope impact)

My feeling is that given that we don't have any logic different for this resource than for other resources we don't need to test everything.
But sure - I can add - will do it now.
